commit.message: release 3.17.1

Fix tests when HOSTNAME is set, but empty string (#1618)

Use a pytest provided fixture instead of implementing our own.

See https://github.com/tox-dev/tox/pull/1616#issuecomment-658437312

This is a fixup of cfe66fd0fe8a81bd65f79f589486b7721632a4cb.

commit.message: release 3.17.0

Use a HOSTNAME environment variable instead of socket.getfqdn() in ResultLog (#1616)

This makes it possible to prevent an undesired DNS query.

Fixes https://github.com/tox-dev/tox/issues/1615

verification.payload:
tree ffecc2f566fe8d3cf8c359ad949957fe4e37a76f
parent 9e61b2d5ed78385c52d584adbe67fbeb44a11f34
author Miro Hrončok <miro@hroncok.cz> 1594754403 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1594754403 +0100

Use a HOSTNAME environment variable instead of socket.getfqdn() in ResultLog (#1616)

This makes it possible to prevent an undesired DNS query.

Fixes https://github.com/tox-dev/tox/issues/1615

commit.message:
Update recommended packaging information for Flit (#1613)

* Update recommended packaging information for Flit

The recommended build-system details are now `flit_core` - see Flit's docs: https://flit.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

`flit_core` 2.x can run on Python 2, so this should work without the `basepython` option as well.

* Add changelog note

verification.payload:
tree 241cec98c158552a62327e390eaf64a25397d61b
parent 7cd99dae4074466cef05608e3cd615f58a252962
author Thomas Kluyver <takowl@gmail.com> 1594676779 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1594676779 +0100

Update recommended packaging information for Flit (#1613)

* Update recommended packaging information for Flit

The recommended build-system details are now `flit_core` - see Flit's docs: https://flit.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

`flit_core` 2.x can run on Python 2, so this should work without the `basepython` option as well.

* Add changelog note
